com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers

Class DocumentSettings<RD extends ReportDataHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.ParameterizableImpl
      • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractStyler
        • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.DocumentSettings<RD>
  • Type Parameters:
    RD -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, ReportDataAware<RD>, DocumentAware, BaseStyler, DocumentStyler<RD>, Cloneable, Observer

    public class DocumentSettings<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
extends AbstractStyler
implements DocumentStyler<RD>
    settings for a pdf, supports page size, margins and encryption. Sets pdf version to 5 unless pdf/1a is required and a viewer preference to toggle visibility of content groups.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void builtInFontHack()
      Puts /HELVETICA.pfb in the fontCache as an embedded font.
      boolean canStyle(Object element)
      returns true when element is null and creates() return true, or when element is assignable from one of the classes in getClassesToStyle().
      void configureVisualSignature(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfSignatureAppearance psa)
      adds a visible signature of 200 / 100 at top left of the first page of the pdf with "verify origin" as reason, the localhost name as location, PdfSignatureAppearance#SELF_SIGNED as filter.
      boolean creates()
      Does the styler create an Element, used by ElementProducer.

      protected void pdfA1A(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter writer)
      called as the last step from #style(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter, com.itextpdf.text.Document, com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder) , calls builtInFontHack() which is necessary when creating PDF/X-1a with iText.

      • TOCTABLEKEY

        public static final String TOCTABLEKEY
        key for looking up stylers in the settings that will be used for styling the table of contents table. The default value for this will be calculated based on document measures ("Table(columns=2,widths=<0.90%>|<0.10%>);AddCell(data=Table of Contents,styleclass=toccaption);AddCell(data=title,styleclass=tocheader);AddCell(data=page,styleclass=tocheader)")
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TOCLEFTWIDTH

        parameter key for setting the width percentage of the left column in the table of contents
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • configureVisualSignature

        public void configureVisualSignature(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfSignatureAppearance psa)
                              throws KeyStoreException,
                                     NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                     UnrecoverableKeyException,
                                     com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        adds a visible signature of 200 / 100 at top left of the first page of the pdf with "verify origin" as reason, the localhost name as location, PdfSignatureAppearance#SELF_SIGNED as filter. Override this if you want a different signature in your pdf.
        Specified by:
        configureVisualSignature in interface DocumentStyler<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
        Parameters:
        psa -
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        UnrecoverableKeyException
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        See Also:
        #loadKeyStore(), }

      • builtInFontHack

        protected void builtInFontHack()
                        throws IOException,
                               com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException,
                               com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        Puts /HELVETICA.pfb in the fontCache as an embedded font.
        Throws:
        IOException
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException - when the argument is not one of the built in fonts
        See Also:
        pdfA1A(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter)

      • pdfA1A

        protected void pdfA1A(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter writer)
               throws IOException,
                      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException,
                      com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        called as the last step from #style(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter, com.itextpdf.text.Document, com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder) , calls builtInFontHack() which is necessary when creating PDF/X-1a with iText.

        writer -
        Throws:
        IOException
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
